{"name": "Hope Atlanta Programs of Travelers Aid", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Visit our office Monday-Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
We are located at 458 Ponce de Leon Ave. NE, Terrace Level (map)

Join us at the Outreach Center.
We serve women and children from 10:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays.", "email": "", "url": "https://hopeatlanta.org/get-help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "458 Ponce De Leon Avenue Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Midtown Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30308", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.774373, "longitude": -84.37234579999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 662-7593", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}]}
